But Mr. Perfect lived up to his moniker becoming one of the best in-ring technicans of his generation. A former AWA World Heavyweight Champion, he also was the longest-reigning Intercontinental Champion of the 1990s. Loved by fans and friends alike, Mr. Perfect entertained in and out of the ring, earning him the honor of induction into the WWE Hall Of Fame. This two-disc set relives his life and career, from his early start as a second-generation star trough AWA, WWE, and WCW. Some of his greatest matches and vignettes are included. Who was this man?
